bug.question: I have six legs and can crawl. I like to eat sweet things, especially at a picnic. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am very small.
🐜 I live in a colony with lots of friends.
🍬 I love sugar!

bug.question: I can fly and I love to visit flowers. I make a sweet treat that you might put in your tea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect nectar.
💛 I am often yellow and black.
🍯 I create a sticky substance.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and spin a chrysalis before I fly around in many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot of leaves when I'm young.
🌈 I have beautiful wings.
✨ I go through metamorphosis.

bug.question: I jump very high and I'm usually green. I make a chirping or clicking sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I live in grassy fields.
🎶 I can be quite noisy in the summer.
🦵 I have strong legs for leaping.

bug.question: I'm a small bug that can light up the night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
🌙 I am often seen during the summer.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl on the ground. If you touch me I will curl up into a ball for safety. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I prefer damp dark places.
🪵 I am often found under logs.
🛡️ My body has segments that act as armor.

bug.question: I have long legs and build a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am not technically an insect because I have eight legs.
🕷️ I come in many shapes and sizes.
🐛 My prey are often flying insects.

bug.question: I'm a noisy insect that lives in trees and makes a buzzing or clicking sound, especially in summer. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love hot weather.
🔊 My sound is very loud and distinct.
🌳 I spend most of my life underground.

bug.question: I'm a tiny, flat bug that feeds on blood and can be found in beds. What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I like to feed on humans and animals.
🛌 I am good at hiding.
🔴 I'm small, brown, and wingless.

bug.question: I mimic a stick to blend into my surroundings and am an expert at camouflage. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look very similar to a branch.
🏞️ I eat plants and leaves.
🌳 I am sometimes called a 'walking stick'.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes a flower. I grow in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunshine and water to grow.
🌻 You can find me in a garden or a park.
🌷 Bees and butterflies like me.

plant.question: I am big and tall with a woody trunk and branches. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I can be very old, sometimes hundreds of years!
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.
🍁 I might lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am a sweet and juicy fruit that grows on trees. I come in different colors like red, green, and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me (maybe a little too much!).
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.
⚕️ An old saying says 'one a day keeps the doctor away'.

plant.question: I am a long, orange root vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am good for your eyes.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🧑‍🌾 Farmers grow me in their gardens.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels growing on a cob. You can pop me to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often grown on farms in the Midwest.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🦃 Native Americans taught the first settlers how to grow me.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have spines to protect myself.
🏜️ I can survive in very dry places.
🐫 Some animals can get water from me.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. I have big, round leaves that float on the surface. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I provide shelter for aquatic animals.
🍃 My leaves are often called pads.
🌸 Sometimes beautiful flowers grow from me.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant that produces sweet, purple or green fruit. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often used to make juice and jelly.
🍷 You can make wine from me (but kids can't drink that!).
🪜 I need a trellis or fence to climb on.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall, strong stalk. My seeds are used to make oil and I follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I have a big, yellow flower head.
☀️ I love sunshine!
🍪 You can eat my seeds as a snack, or put them in muffins.

plant.question: I am a very large flower and also the name of a wild cat. I am known for my spotted petals and strong scent. What am I?

hints.text: 🐅 My name sounds the same as a big cat.
💐 I am often used in perfumes.
🧪 Sometimes used as a herbal remedy.
